trigger.expression: {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p1.dimma1.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p1.dimma2.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p1.dimmb1.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p1.dimmb2.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p1.dimmc1.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p1.dimmc2.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p1.dimmd1.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p1.dimmd2.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p2.dimme1.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p2.dimme2.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p2.dimmf1.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p2.dimmf2.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p2.dimmg1.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p2.dimmg2.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p2.dimmh1.temp.last()}>70 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.p2.dimmh2.temp.last()}>70
trigger.name: DIMM temperature critical on {HOSTNAME}

trigger.expression: {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fan1.last()}>9000 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fan1.last()}<100 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fan2.last()}>9000 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fan2.last()}<100 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fan3.last()}>9000 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fan3.last()}<100 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fan4.last()}>9000 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fan4.last()}<100 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fana.last()}>9000 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fana.last()}<100 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fanb.last()}>9000 or {IPMI - Supermicro - X10DRW-E:ipmi.supermicro.x10drw-e.fanb.last()}<100
trigger.name: Fan critical on {HOSTNAME}
